name: "The Princess Bride" movie sound-bites (interactive keyboard)
description:
This is an interactive NFT. Click on the Poor Circus Performers cover image to start. Then you can click on any of the digital keys to play a sound-bite from the movie. There is also a backing music track that you can play too. All artwork is original by Guiding Rock.
The UI/UX was made with HTML, CSS, and Javascript. And I spent several hours collecting sound-bites and turning them into audio samples that I then assigned to keys on my MIDI keyboard. The backing music track is also original.

If the keys aren't working, try refreshing the page.
Have fun and enjoy!
